name: TIMERUSH
description:
TIMERUSH

The Time Orb has suddenly started to break and shatter time and space you must quickly go and stop it from fully breaking before it's too late. 

You Must Be Quick!

The character has the ability to slow down time while moving at the same speed and that can only last for 3 seconds. 

Controls: A, D to move & F to slow down time. 

This is my very first time joining a game jam and this game was made in 8 days. It is also the very first time I make a full game from start to finish, it is really short but I hope you find it fun!

Ground assets: https://i-am-44.itch.io/free-1-bit-dungeon-tileset
